lead_paragraph: India won the Asia Cup with an eight-wicket triumph over hosts Bangladesh on Sunday as opener Shikhar Dhawan returned to form with a half-century in a 94-run stand with Virat Kohli in a rain-hit final.

headline.print_headline: India Win Asia Cup as Dhawan Hits Form Against Bangladesh
headline.main: India Win Asia Cup as Dhawan Hits Form Against Bangladesh

snippet: India won the Asia Cup with an eight-wicket triumph over hosts Bangladesh on Sunday as opener Shikhar Dhawan returned to form with a half-century in a 94-run stand with Virat Kohli in a rain-hit final....
